arts.ttl: Club Brugge manager hails Barcelona as ‘one of the best teams in the world’ ahead of UCL face-off
arts.sum: Barcelona will look to get back on track in the UEFA Champions League as they take on Club Brugge this midweek. Although the Catalans are coming on the back of a mammoth 6-1 win over Olympiacos, they are still outside the top eight. Securing a win against the Belgian club, therefore, will be key.
